info.title: MailboxValidator
info.description: MailboxValidator API is easy to integrate and use for email validation. Validate and clean your email list by detecting disposable emails, invalid emails, mail server and much more.

domain.description: The domain of the email address.
domain.title: Domain

is_free.description: Whether the email address is from a free email provider like Gmail or Hotmail.
is_free.title: Is Free

is_syntax.description: Whether the email address is syntactically correct.
is_syntax.title: Is Syntax

is_domain.description: Whether the email address has a valid MX record in its DNS entries. '-' means not applicable.
is_domain.title: Is Domain

is_smtp.description: Whether the mail servers specified in the MX records are responding to connections. '-' means not applicable
is_smtp.title: Is SMTP

is_verified.description: Whether the mail server confirms that the email address actually exist. '-' means not applicable.
is_verified.title: Is Verified

is_server_down.description: Whether the mail server is currently down or unresponsive. '-' means not applicable.
is_server_down.title: Is Server Down

is_greylisted.description: Whether the mail server employs greylisting where an email has to be sent a second time at a later time. '-' means not applicable.
is_greylisted.title: Is Greylisted

is_disposable.description: Whether the email address is a temporary one from a disposable email provider. '-' means not applicable.
is_disposable.title: Is Disposable

is_suppressed.description: Whether the email address is in our blacklist. '-' means not applicable.
is_suppressed.title: Is Suppressed

is_role.description: Whether the email address is a role-based email address like admin@example.net or webmaster@example.net. '-' means not applicable.
is_role.title: Is Role

is_high_risk.description: Whether the email address contains high risk keywords. '-' means not applicable.
is_high_risk.title: Is High Risk

is_catchall.description: Whether the email address is a catch-all address. '-' means not applicable.
is_catchall.title: Is Catchall

mailboxvalidator_score.description: Email address reputation score. Score > 0.70 means good; score > 0.40 means fair; score â‰¤ 0.40 means poor.
mailboxvalidator_score.title: MailboxValidator Score

time_taken.description: The time taken to get the results in seconds.
time_taken.title: Time Taken

status.description: Whether our system think the email address is valid based on all the previous fields.
status.title: Status

credits_available.description: The number of credits left to perform validations.
credits_available.title: Credits Available

error_code.description: The error code if there is any error.
error_code.title: Error Code

error_message.description: The error message if there is any error.
error_message.title: Error Message

get.description: Returns validations for a single email address.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address to be validated.

is_disposable.description: Whether the email address is a temporary one from a disposable email provider. '-' means not applicable.
is_disposable.title: Is Disposable

credits_available.description: The number of credits left to perform validations.
credits_available.title: Credits Available

error_code.description: The error code if there is any error.
error_code.title: Error Code

error_message.description: The error message if there is any error.
error_message.title: Error Message

get.summary: Validate email address is from a disposable email provider
get.description: Returns validation from whether email address is from a disposable email provider. Disposable email addresses (DEAs) are temporary email addresses that are only valid for a very short period of time.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address to be validated.

is_free.description: Whether the email address is from a free email provider like Gmail or Hotmail.
is_free.title: Is Free

credits_available.description: The number of credits left to perform validations.
credits_available.title: Credits Available

error_code.description: The error code if there is any error.
error_code.title: Error Code

error_message.description: The error message if there is any error.
error_message.title: Error Message

get.summary: Validate email address is from a free email provider
get.description: Returns validation from whether email address is from a free email provider.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address to be validated.
